title: 注册插件问题：玩家登出后，再次进入物品消失，进帖看详情
author: 爱尚伤痕
txt_content:
注册插件问题：玩家登出后，再次进入物品消失，并且回到上一次的地点，服务器用的是CrazyLogin←是它的问题还是ESS或者GroupManager？

CrazyLogin的con配置文件如下=-=
# CrazyLogin config.yml
# For more information visit
# https://github.com/ST-DDT/Crazy/ ... ogin/src/config.yml
version: '7.22'
chatHeader: '&C[&ACrazyLogin&C] &F'
database:
  FLAT:
    filePath: accounts.db
  saveType: FLAT
  saveOnShutdown: true
saveLoginLocations:
  DIM24:
    x: 0.0
    y: 1.0
    z: 0.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: DIM24
  spawn:

    y: 94.0
    z: 31.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: spawn
  DIM23:

    y: 91.0
    z: -2.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: DIM23

    x: 87.0
    y: 74.0
    z: 2.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0

    pitch: 0.0
    world: TheRacing

    x: 0.0
    y: 64.0
    z: 0.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0

  world:
    x: 476.0
    y: 69.0
    z: -185.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: world
  kall:
    x: 130.0
    y: 69.0
    z: 145.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: kall
minPasswordLength: 3
protectedAccountMinPasswordLength: 7
alwaysNeedPassword: true
confirmNewPassword: false
confirmWithOldPassword: false
dynamicProtection: false
hideWarnings: false
autoLogout: 3600
autoKick: -1
autoTempBan: -1
autoKickUnregistered: -1
autoKickLoginFailer: 3
autoTempBanLoginFailer: -1
autoKickCommandUsers: -1
autoTempBanCommandUsers: -1
blockGuestCommands: true
blockGuestChat: false
blockGuestJoin: false
removeGuestData: false
disableRegistrations: false
disableAdminLogin: true
disableTokenLogin: true
doNotSpamAuthRequests: false
doNotSpamRegisterRequests: false
delayAuthRequests: 0
repeatAuthRequests: 200
commandWhitelist:
- /l(ogin)?(\z| .*)
- /register(\z| .*)
- /language(\z| [a-z]{2,3}_[a-z]{2,3})
- /language select(\z| .*)
- /language list(\z| .*)
- /worldedit cui
forceSingleSession: true
forceSingleSessionSameIPBypass: true
delayPreRegisterSecurity: 5
delayPreLoginSecurity: false
saveLoginEnabled: true
forceSaveLogin: false
hideInventory: false
hidePlayer: false
hideChat: false
delayJoinQuitMessages: false
useCustomJoinQuitMessages: true
hidePasswordsFromConsole: false
autoDelete: -1
maxStoredIPs: 5
maxOnlinesPerIP: 3
maxRegistrationsPerIP: 3
pluginCommunicationEnabled: false
moveRange: 5.0
filterNames: '[a-zA-Z0-9_]'
blockDifferentNameCases: false
minNameLength: 3
maxNameLength: 16
logs:
  AccessDenied:
    path: false
    console: false
  Account:
    path: false
    console: false
  ChatBlocked:
    path: false
    console: false

    path: false
    console: false

    path: false
    console: false

    path: false
    console: false
  LoginFail:
    path: false
    console: false
  Logout:
    path: false
    console: false
  Quit:
    path: false
    console: false
metrics:
  enabled: true
encryptor:
  name: CrazyCrypt1


CrazyCore前置插件的con文件


# CrazyCore config.yml
# For more information visit
# https://github.com/ST-DDT/Crazy/ ... Core/src/config.yml
bukkitServerAPIKey: none
version: 10.7.7
chatHeader: '&C[&ACrazyCore&C] &F'
checkForUpdates: true
wipePlayerWorldFiles: true
wipePlayerFilePaths: []
wipePlayerCommands: []
wipePlayerBans: false
protectedPlayersEnabled: false
protectedPlayers: []
protectedPlayersIllegalAccessCommands: []
disablePipes: false
showChatHeaders: true
loadUserLanguages: true
defaultLanguage: zh_zh
preloadedLanguages:
- zh_zh
- en_en
logs:
  ProtectedPlayer:
    path: false
    console: false
metrics:
  enabled: true

replies.author: 爱尚伤痕
replies.txt_content: 加上=-=管理权限却不会。。。。是不是Gm的问题啊
